languages.text: Богохульные приказы, отдаваемые Вольным Торговцем и перечившие заветам Бога-Императора, сподвигли Махария Зауэрбэка на измену. Однако готовящийся мятеж был выдан сыном набожного аристократа. Больше не сдерживаемый авторитетом отца, новый глава дома Гетка Зауэрбэк поспешил соблазниться прежде недоступными ему возможностями.

Profane orders issued by the Rogue Trader in defiance of the commandments of the God-Emperor pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's authority, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge in new opportunities previously beyond his reach.
languages.original_text: Богохульные приказы, отдаваемые Вольным Торговцем и перечившие заветам Бога-Императора, сподвигли Махария Зауэрбэка на измену. Однако готовящийся мятеж был выдан сыном набожного аристократа. Больше не сдерживаемый авторитетом отца, новый глава дома Гетка Зауэрбэк поспешил соблазниться прежде недоступными ему возможностями.

traits.locale_text: Blasphemous orders given by the Rogue Trader, that defied the commandments of the God-Emperor, pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the mutiny in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of one zealous aristocrat. The new head of the house, Hetka Sauerback, was no longer held back by his father's command and was quick to indulge with new opportunities, that were previously beyond his reach.

Blasphemous orders given by the Rogue Trader, that defied the commandments of the God-Emperor, pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the mutiny in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of one zealous aristocrat. The new head of the house, Hetka Sauerback, was no longer held back by his father's command and was quick to indulge with new opportunities, that were previously beyond his reach.

Profane orders issued by the Rogue Trader in defiance of the commandments of the God-Emperor pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's command, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

No longer held back by his father's command, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's authority, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge in new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

Profane orders issued by the Rogue Trader in defiance of the commandments of the God-Emperor pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's authority, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge in new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

languages.text: 行商浪人无视神皇的戒律，发布了亵渎的命令，因此马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克不得不背叛他的{mf|主人|女主人}。然而，他还没来得及叛变，就落到了某个狂热贵族的儿子手中，被带到了行商浪人面前。赫特卡·苏尔贝克成为了家族的新任首领，不再被父亲的权威所束缚，很快就抓住了这前所未有的新机遇。
languages.original_text: Profane orders issued by the Rogue Trader in defiance of the commandments of the God-Emperor pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's authority, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge in new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人无视神皇的戒律，发布了亵渎的命令，因此马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克不得不背叛他的{mf|主人|女主人}。然而，他还没来得及叛变，就落到了某个狂热贵族的儿子手中，被带到了行商浪人面前。赫特卡·苏尔贝克成为了家族的新任首领，不再被父亲的命令所束缚，很快就抓住了这前所未有的新机遇。

languages.text: Profane Befehle {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, die gegen die Gebote des Gottimperators verstießen, trieben Macharius Sauerback dazu, {mf|seinen Herren|seine Herrin} zu verraten. Doch der angehende Verräter wurde vom Sohn eines eifrigen Aristokraten an {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ausgeliefert. Hetka Sauerback wurde als neuer Kopf seines Hauses nicht länger von seinem Vater zurückgehalten. Er verfolgte unverzüglich neue Gelegenheiten, die bisher außer Reichweite gewesen waren.
languages.original_text: Profane orders issued by the Rogue Trader in defiance of the commandments of the God-Emperor pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's authority, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge in new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

traits.locale_text: Profane Befehle {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, die gegen die Gebote des Gottimperators verstießen, trieben Macharius Sauerback dazu, {mf|seinen Herren|seine Herrin} zu verraten. Doch der angehende Verräter wurde vom Sohn eines eifrigen Aristokraten an {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ausgeliefert. Hetka Sauerback wurde als neuer Kopf seines Hauses nicht länger von seinem Vater zurückgehalten. Er verfolgte unverzüglich neue Gelegenheiten, die bisher außer Reichweite gewesen waren.

languages.text: Les ordres profanes émis par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} au mépris des commandements de l'Empereur-Dieu poussèrent Macharius Sauerback à comploter contre {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}. Cependant, le traître en devenir fut livré {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} par le fils d'un aristocrate zélé. Libéré de la férule de son père et devenu le nouveau chef de sa maison, Hetka Sauerback ne tarda pas à saisir les nouvelles opportunités jusque-là hors de sa portée.
languages.original_text: Profane orders issued by the Rogue Trader in defiance of the commandments of the God-Emperor pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's authority, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge in new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

traits.locale_text: Les ordres profanes émis par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} au mépris des commandements de l'Empereur-Dieu poussèrent Macharius Sauerback à comploter contre {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}. Cependant, le traître en devenir fut livré {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} par le fils d'un aristocrate zélé. Libéré de la férule de son père et devenu le nouveau chef de sa maison, Hetka Sauerback ne tarda pas à saisir les nouvelles opportunités jusque là hors de sa portée.

languages.text: Las órdenes profanas de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en contra de los mandamientos del Dios Emperador llevaron a Macharius Sauerback a traicionar a su am{mf|o|a}, pero el ambicioso hijo de un aristócrata lo llevó ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán antes de que completara su plan. Libre del yugo de su padre, Hetka Sauerback, como nuevo dirigente de su casa, no dudó en aprovechar las oportunidades que hasta entonces se le habían negado.
languages.original_text: Profane orders issued by the Rogue Trader in defiance of the commandments of the God-Emperor pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's authority, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge in new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

traits.locale_text: Las órdenes profanas de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en contra de los mandamientos del Dios Emperador llevaron a Macharius Sauerback a traicionar a su am{mf|o|a}, pero el ambicioso hijo de un aristócrata lo llevó ante {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán antes de que completara su plan. Libre del yugo de su padre, Hetka Sauerback, como nuevo dirigente de su casa, no dudó en aprovechar las oportunidades que hasta entonces se le habían negado.

languages.text: 自由開拓者が神帝陛下の戒律に背いて発した不敬な命令が、マハリウス・ザウアーバックを裏切りへと駆り立てた。しかし、その裏切り者は熱狂的な貴族の息子によって自由開拓者に引き渡された。ヘトカ・ザウアーバックは、父親の権威によって拘束されることはもはやなく、新しい当主として、以前は手の届かなかった新たなチャンスにすぐに飛びついた。
languages.original_text: Profane orders issued by the Rogue Trader in defiance of the commandments of the God-Emperor pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's authority, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge in new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーが神帝陛下の戒律に背いて発した不敬な命令が、マハリウス・ザウアーバックを裏切りへと駆り立てた。しかし、その裏切り者は熱狂的な貴族の息子によってローグトレーダーに引き渡された。ヘトカ・ザウアーバックは、父親の命令によって拘束されることはもはやなく、新しい当主として、以前は手の届かなかった新たなチャンスにすぐに飛びついた。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in Tanrı İmparator'un buyruklarına karşı gelen din dışı emirleri, Macharius Sauerback'in efendisine sırt çevirmesine neden olsa da ihanetini eyleme dökemeden bağnaz bir aristokratın oğlu tarafından Hür Tacir'e teslim edildi. Artık babasının otoritesine boyun eğmeyen Hetka Sauerback, hanenin yeni başı olarak eskiden erişemediği yeni fırsatlara uzanmakta gecikmedi.
languages.original_text: Profane orders issued by the Rogue Trader in defiance of the commandments of the God-Emperor pushed Macharius Sauerback to betray his {mf|master|mistress}. But the traitor in the making was turned over to the Rogue Trader by the son of a zealous aristocrat. No longer held back by his father's authority, Hetka Sauerback, as the new head of his house, was quick to indulge in new opportunities previously beyond his reach.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in Tanrı İmparator'un buyruklarına karşı gelen din dışı emirleri, Macharius Sauerback'in efendisine sırt çevirmesine neden oldu ancak ihanetini faaliyete dökemeden önce bağnaz bir aristokratın oğlu tarafından Hür Tacir'e teslim edildi. Artık babasının otoritesi tarafından dizginlenemeyen Hetka Sauerback, hanenin yeni başı olarak, eskiden uzanamadığı yeni fırsatlara hamle yapmakta gecikmedi.
